scripts.marp:html: npx marp presentation.md && npx marp presentation.md -o $GIT_ROOT/output/presentation.html --allow-local-files
scripts.marp:pdf: npx marp presentation.md --pdf && npx marp presentation.md -o $GIT_ROOT/output/presentation.pdf --allow-local-files
scripts.marp:pptx: npx marp presentation.md --pptx && npx marp presentation.md -o $GIT_ROOT/output/presentation.pptx --allow-local-files
